name: Prime Hake Steaks with Chunky Roasted Vegetables
author: Tanya Metelerkamp
summary: This is another family favorite in my house.
ingredients: 7  ripe tomatoes, each cut into quarters
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place onion wedges and garlic in a roasting pan; drizzle 1 tablespoon olive oil over mixture
Turn onions a few times to evenly coat with oil
Add tomatoes to onion mixture and drizzle remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil over tomatoes
Season mixture with salt and basil
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes
Add hake steaks and wine to onion mixture; sprinkle brown sugar over the onion mixture
Bake in the oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 30 minutes more
